doc.name: beepDuration
doc.summary: Sets the length of the sound played by the beep command.

examples.example: set the beepDuration to 2000 -- two seconds

description.p: Use the beepDuration property to vary the length of the beep, in order to increase or decrease its urgency.
The beepDuration is an integer between -1 and 65535.
By default, the beepDuration is 500 (half a second).
Set the beepDuration to -1 to use the default system setting.
The beepDuration has no effect on Windows systems, and on some Unix systems which don't allow changing the beep length.
